description:
Lion and her friends are enjoying a tea party in Yuko`s room when they unexpectedly learn the date of her birthday. What`s more, it`s today! Yayoi proposes throwing a surprise party for Yuko, and Lion remembers that Yuko once said she wanted to have a pajama party. To buy a birthday present for Yuko, Lion heads to Pirari Town to visit it for her first time.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Shirogane no Grizzly: Ko no Kokoro Oyashirazu
The Silver Grizzly: There Is No Love Like a Child`s
白銀のグリズリー -子の心親知らず-
백은의 그리즐리: 아이의 마음을 부모는 모른다
